entries.journal_entry_description: Gendra told you how to get to the Imperial pilot trainer.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: You need to make your way to the shuttle port so you can head to Bestine and learn to fly from the Imperial pilot trainer.
entries.task01_message_box_text: Ah, you've found the shuttle port. Use the Travel Terminal to buy yourself a ticket to Bestine. Select the planetary map to see all the available shuttleports on this planet. Next, speak to the nearby droid, who is named, Ticket Collector, to board your shuttle. When you get to Mos Espa follow the next waypoint I give you to the Imperial pilot trainer. When you're done you may want to come back to Mos Eisley on the shuttle, but that's up to you.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: The Imperial pilot trainer will teach me to fly so I can use my skills to further the aims of the Empire.
